---
title: "rodham"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(rodham)
library(networkD3)
library(htmltools)
library(igraph)
library(dplyr)
emails <- emails %>%
  select(to, from) %>%
  filter(to != "" & from != "") %>%
  group_by(to, from) %>%
  summarise(edges = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(edges)) %>%
  as.data.frame(.)

g <- graph.data.frame(emails)
wc <- cluster_walktrap(g)
clusters <- membership(wc)
g <- igraph_to_networkD3(g, group = clusters)

MyClickScript <- 'alert("You clicked on " + d.name);'
```

```{r header text}
p(em("Network of emails - random walk clustering (color)."))
```

```{r graph header}
forceNetwork(Links = g$links, Nodes = g$nodes, clickAction = MyClickScript,
             Source = 'source', Target = 'target', linkDistance = 20, width = "100%", height = 600,
             NodeID = 'name', Group = 'group', charge = -90, bounded = FALSE)
```
